Audius JavaScript SDK

Overview‚Äã

The Audius JavaScript (TypeScript) SDK allows you to easily build on and interact with the Audius protocol.

  • ‚úçÔ∏è Log In with Audius
  • üéµ Fetch and stream tracks
  • üîç Search and display users, tracks, and playlists

üë∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è We're actively working on building out more SDK features and functionality - stay tuned!

Installation‚Äã

  • Node.js
  • HTML + JS

Node.js‚Äã

1. Install the SDK package using your preferred JS package manager‚Äã

In your terminal, run:

npm install web3 @audius/sdk

2. Initialize the SDK‚Äã

import { sdk } from '@audius/sdk'

const audiusSdk = sdk({ appName: 'Name of your app goes here' })

3. Make your first API call using the SDK!‚Äã

const track = await audiusSdk.track.getTrack({ trackId: 'D7KyD' })
console.log(track, 'Track fetched!')

Full example‚Äã

app.js
import Web3 from 'web3'import { sdk } from '@audius/sdk'// If running in a browser, set window.Web3window.Web3 = Web3const audiusSdk = sdk({ appName: 'My Example App' })const track = await audiusSdk.track.getTrack({ trackId: 'D7KyD' })console.log(track, 'Track fetched!')

HTML + JS‚Äã

1. Include the SDK script tag‚Äã

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/web3@latest/dist/web3.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@audius/sdk@latest/dist/sdk.min.js"></script>

The Audius SDK will then be assigned to window.audiusSdk.

2. Initialize the SDK‚Äã

const audiusSdk = window.audiusSdk({ appName: 'Name of your app goes here' })

3. Make your first API call using the SDK!‚Äã

const track = await audiusSdk.track.getTrack({ trackId: 'D7KyD' })

Full example‚Äã

index.html
<!DOCTYPE html><html>  <head>    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/web3@latest/dist/web3.min.js"></script>    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@audius/sdk@latest/dist/sdk.min.js"></script>    <script>        const fn = async () => {        const audiusSdk = window.audiusSdk({          appName: "My Example App",        });        const track = await audiusSdk.tracks.getTrack({ trackId: 'D7KyD' });        console.log(track, "Track fetched!");      }      fn()    </script>  </head>  <body>    <h1>Example content</h1>  </body></html>
